chapter.title: What is the Gentoo Cluster Project?

body.p: The Gentoo Cluster Project aims to make Gentoo a desirable platform for high-performance and high-availability clustering. The project will develop documentation and support for designing and implementing clusters. This will increase Gentoo's visibility in enterprise-level computing.
Please join us in IRC on freenode.net, #gentoo-cluster.
Adelie Linux is contributing to the high-performance subproject.

The current active subprojects in the Gentoo Cluster Project are:
Project: Description:
High-Performance Computing This subproject is developing documentation for and supporting high-performance clusters with the help of Adelie Linux. A howto is available here
High-Availability Clusters This subproject is developing documentation for and preparing to support high-availability clusters.

Each person working on the Gentoo Cluster Project is listed here alphabetically. Full time indicates that their main Gentoo position is on this project, part time indicates that their main position lies in another area but they do additional work with this project.
